name: AmiRun and the Beer Mania
description:
Beer Mania starts on a playing grid that is empty except for the starting piece. The Object is to score as many points as possible by constructing a continuous pipeline from the starting piece.

In order to advance to the next level, the Beer must flow through a certain number of pipes. A counter in the upper right corner of the screen indicates the minimum number of sections that must be connected within that level.

During a running round there are a few useful buttons you can press.

ESCAPE - Opens the ingame menu. (Back to Menu, Quit Game)

F - Speeds up the flow of the Beer

P - Pauses the game

F1 - Change Control mode for Player 1

F2 - Change Control mode for Player 2
